Description.Text: The hotel is under Green World Group suitable for leisure traveller.

0.1 mi (0.2 km) from Miniatures Museum of Taiwan and within 3 mi (5 km) of Chiang Kai-shek Memorial Hall and Taipei 101. National Taiwan Museum and Sun Yat-Sen Memorial Hall are also within 3 mi (5 km). Taipei Arena is 1 km from Green World Hotel - Grand Nanjing, and The Taipei Jianguo Jade & Flower Market is 1.4 km away. Taipei Songshan Airport is 1.9 km from the property.
Breakfast, Lunch and Dinner is available at this property.
This accommodation has a small lobby.
